overview: Jim won’t boast about his coding, engineering, linguistic or design skills. He isn’t likely to tell you that he’s an accomplished cyclist or triathlete. When you work with someone over a span of 17 years and 5 companies, you get some of their bragging rights: Lead Developer at The Alpha Group, Lead Developer of Invoke Systems, Founding Partner at iCommunicate, Lead Developer at Microsoft. We know Jim. And, since Jim doesn’t talk about himself, we will.
